official_title: Recognizing the Mozart Bicentennial at the Lincoln Center in New York City, New York, as a National Observance of the 200th anniversary of the death of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.

summary.text: Recognizes the Mozart Bicentennial at Lincoln Center in New York City, from January 1991 through August 1992, as a National Observance of the 200th anniversary of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's death.

titles.title: Recognizing the Mozart Bicentennial at the Lincoln Center in New York City, New York, as a National Observance of the 200th anniversary of the death of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.
